p: EOs are widely utilized in various products including detergents, creams, lotions, perfumes, and soaps and different food products such as beverages, baked foods, puddings, and meat products. They are well known for their antimicrobial properties and can be applied as antiseptic agents ( 117, 118). Therefore, EOs can be considered as an alternative for chemical preservatives in food products such as meat and meat products ( 119).
